name: James Grapes
text: Made pizza incorrectly and was dismissive of my inconvenience. Place is ran by teens who are indifferent about producing a quality product in a friendly atmosphere. I do not recommend this location. Try the other one by North Central... that place is ran by more professional employees.

name: Brandon T
text: Definitely not gourmet pizza but i seem to find it more enjoyable than more expensive places. The location is also great. Nice spot within walking distance of a grocery store AND one of the best liqour stores in town. Great stop on a Friday …More

name: Richard Andrade
text: Fast food pizza... hey , let's be honest... Even cheap Pizza is good.... 4 stars only because there are Pizza Restaurants that deserve that extra star.

name: Samantha Hayes
text:
Delivery Driver added her own tip.
I have gotten delivery from here many times, but have NEVER had such an awful experience as this last one. I filled out my tip and total lines on the merchant …More

name: Knotty Tv
text: Having a previous problem with a order, I was very satisfied after talking to them. Night of March 1st I placed replacement order for the mishap and was very impressed by not only the people, especially my delivery driver. But, also by the quality of my pizza. Look forward to future business from them and HIGHLY recommend them!

name: James Glover
text: Papa John's is one of my favorite pizza places! Tasty and good quality ingredients.

name: Anthony Hokanson
text:
I will never order here again. Lackluster service.

Ordered “the works” without olives online. …More

name: Miss Shirley
text: 1st, Google maps took me to 3 other pizza places in error. Very hard to see from the street, its inside Safeway parking lot. Looks like an espresso stand almost. The pizzas, (one regular, one chix w white sauce) were both undercooked.The …More

name: josh lang
text: It was ok pizza when it was $20. Went back 2 days later and not only did the pizza almost double in price 20-31$ but so did the wait time. I'll never go to another papa johns again. If they wouldn't of swiped my card without telling me the wait time I would have walked out. Won't ever make the mistake of going here again.

name: Andi Bergman
text: We get our pizza here all the time because its good but we ask for it to be delivered to us at 6pm and without fail it comes at 6:30pm, and we call around 4:30pm so no excuses, but the delivery people are all really nice.

name: Ariel Dauthier
text: My order was slightly messed up, but Hannah was very sweet and totally made up for it. She had us another pizza on the way shortly and a complimentary soda. She went above and beyond, and I believe she should be recognized for her exceptional customer service. On a side note, it was 10pm but the pizza was super fresh and hot.

name: Scott Conners
text: I tried to order online from a store that is 1.9 miles from my house. Online it said that I am outside of that stores delivery area. I called the store, and they said online was mistaken and I am not outside the delivery area. I asked for …More

name: Melissa Crain
text: Good pizza with friendly service

name: Charles Perry
text: Extra sauce and well done and you can't go won't.

name: Kurt Stranne
text: Papa John's pizza is good but I considered MOD Pizza to be better

name: Alexander Keffer
text: These guys have great deals on pizza pretty often

name: Kristina Riley
text: Even though our order was wrong, the manager took full responsibility for the mistake and even had the delivery guy bring us the correct order. BTW, they only had one driver at the time, so for them to go above and beyond to fix the …More

name: MadBlack HackHatter
text: Even tho it took 180 minutes it was worth every minute I had to wait for it was the fourth of July and not a damn decent place to day was open cept for Papa John's apparently. The food was on point and the girl was really cool about being swamped and hella backed up with deliveries for the whole day. (plus she was cute too!)

name: Eric C
text: Great pizza! It's always fresh and hot if you pick it up or have it delivered. Their order online is the easiest to use and remembers your favorite pizza's

name: Monique Rose
text: Manager here is super rude and we just called to order a combo pizza and ended up having to hang up because she couldn't match a description of a combo pizza to the "works" we asked her to ask some one what a combo pizza was and she refused. Ever since the new manager has been there nobody knows anything.

name: nickel bee
text: 3.33 for delivery fee?! It keeps going up... quality is  low usually. I almost feel like on certain  days they use old ingredients or give you old pizzas. Only about 1 out of 4 tries is it any good. Otherwise  it looks and smells kinda gross. Better than the other places here but that's  not saying much.

name: Simon Strauss
text: Overpriced Ratatouille on bread, misses cheese and taste.

name: Terry Lynch
text: High Allyson..  Love Franks!

name: Joe Jackson
text: Very good fast clean service

name: Nathan Haynes
text: Good food, fast service.

name: Tango Romeo
text: Order is wrong EVERY TIME. It’s like they aaaalmost get it right but no..... Hire someone to do NOTHING but double check delivery orders. Friday night crew* Pretty sure everybody there is stoned but the pizza is good.

name: Hope Laux
text: Ordered a large 2 topping pizza with half cheese half Canadian bacon and pineapple and received a large Canadian bacon and pineapple pizza. I called to get this fixed and was told that the cooks swore they had the order right and that the …More

text: I'd like to have more flavor.

name: Dustin Kelley
text: Thought we'd give these guys another chance after our last debacle. We haven't lost hope yet we'll see how it goes in the next future visits.
